comment: Anything over 3 seasons I have trouble following lol. I learned my lesson with "Once upon a time" and " supernatural". To be fair supernatural had the same plot every episode lol. So I have not seen game of thrones. I can't seem to invest myself in this stuff. And they're are many great actors making great series, but this is just me. And yes, AH's performance in AM is so very flat. Like a soda left out overnight lol. She has the same faces and mannerisms in all her "work". Aye, curumba.

comment:
At this point, you could replace Amber with a plate of spaghetti, and people would flock to the theatres, simply because she's not in it. 
I never even saw the first one (because it didn't seem interesting to me) but I won't see the first one ever because I won't contribute to her royalties, however, if Emilia is in the sequel, then I will go see it.! I loved her and Jason in GoT.  No doubt box office will be through the roof with her as the lead. :)

author: Luke Maher

comment:
Almost 2 million signatures just shows how high the number of people who have been victims of domestic abuse is. I wish people realized that the support for JD in this case has more to do with victims of DV than just being a supporter of JD.

I have never paid attention to Hollywood or Entertainment news etc. but last year I just happened to run across one of the videos of audio clips between Amber and JD and after only a few minutes I recognized that Amber was clearly the abuser....

I would never wish the experience of being romantically involved with a Narcissistic or psychopath on anyone...not only do they murder you psychologically they ruin you in every conceivable way....survivors feel very strongly about supporting the people who need it and calling out the evil manipulative ways of the abusers....ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü•∏üíØ
